segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a dress and an apron, very domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe the sink is overflowing so dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just sheeting over the front edge of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a growing puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually standing right in the puddle!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely blank, utterly unaware of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, constantly adding to the deluge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattention is truly baffling to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the floorboards don't start to warp from all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste of water too, just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
